about_the_game:
A brand new asymmetric VR experience designed for the Limeviathan arcade cabinet. Either take control of the colossal Limeviathan in VR, or command a fleet of Pie-rat ships on a more traditional screen as you do battle with your friends in this casual arcade style RTS/VR game!

Limeviathan is a local 2 player asymmetric VR game where players are placed in an island arena. The VR player controls the mythical Limeviathan, as the traditional pc player commands a fleet of Pie-rats. The Pie-rat fleet goal is to slay the Limeviathan and save their fleet from succumbing to the terror of scurvy, as the Limeviathan defends themselves from the cannon onslaught to come.

Overwhelm Your Foe

As commander of the Pie-rat fleet, your goal is to defeat the Limeviathan to fuel your naval army and save your community from perishing. Use your keylime currency to craft war-ships and send them out to battle. Each tentacle you take off from the Limeviathan is more funding for your battle!

Control The Limeviathan

As the Limeviathan, your goal is to defend yourself from the incoming Pie-rat fleet. Use your arms to throw and grab vessels, and your abilities to defend from afar. Your 8 arms, and your friendly Lemegalodon are what you have to defend yourself.
